casebody.data:
SYNTEX (U.S.A.) LLC, and Allergan, Inc., Plaintiffs-Appellees, v. APOTEX, INC., Apotex Corp., and Novex Pharma, Defendants-Appellants. No. 2006-1495. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. April 9, 2007.

Before RADER, GAJARSA, and PROST, Circuit Judges.

Judgment

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is

ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
